channel.title: Problem with Server
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm having a problem with my server.
I'm currently using the Zenith source and client and when I do the ::yell command I get the "Owner" title and when my moderator does it he gets the "Moderator" title but when the other Owner does it he receives the "Donator" title instead.
Can somebody help me with this problem, really needed.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/37/helpzr.png/][IMG]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/5742/helpzr.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]

item.title: Problem with Server
item.dc:creator: @xxd3v0xx xxd3v0xx
item.description:
@xxd3v0xx wrote:

zyle1992:

Post your code for the yell command

::yell

		}
		if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("yell")) {
			String message = "";
			for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
				message += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? "" : " ");
			sendYell(player, Utils.fixChatMessage(message), false);
			return true;

Read full topic
